Fact Sheet:
Compatibility: Windows XP/Vista/7 (32 and 64 bits).
Hardware Requirements: 64 MB RAM, 104 MB HDD space.
File Size: 104.77 MB.
Language: Multilingual (Spanish).
Medical and detailed instructions including installation.

Description:

The new Ashampoo Office 2012, powerful and excellent cost-effectiveness, provides everything you need to work with documents, spreadsheets, presentations and more! Ashampoo Office 2012 contains Ashampoo TextMaker 2012, PlanMaker 2012 and Ashampoo Ashampoo Presentations 2012.

Ashampoo TextMaker 2012 is your expert in word processing. Whether it is a letter, a circular or a scientific paper, this software provides the best support possible for all tasks related to word processing. Ashampoo TextMaker 2012 is compatible with various file formats, eg. all formats Microsoft Word from 6.0 to 2010.

Ashampoo PlanMaker 2012 is a spreadsheet software powerful and easy to use. With Ashampoo PlanMaker can not only create spreadsheets and perform calculations with ease thanks to more than 330 functions, but also create stunning graphics. It supports XLS and XLSX formats for Microsoft Excel 5.0 to Excel 2010 and exported directly to PDF.

Boring and dull presentations are a thing of the past with Ashampoo Presentations 2012! Presentations can easily add professionally designed templates and brilliant animations and transitions based on DirectX technology. This will impress any audience!

In the latest version of Office Ashampo have implemented many more features and improvements. As usual, Ashampoo Office 2012 can be installed on a USB flash memory to use it anywhere. Ashampoo Office 2012 Download now and experience the word processing, spreadsheets and presentations at the highest level!.
